content.body: Has the unit protocol been discussed on a Numerics or TG2 call after its presentation to TG1? Both of those feel like appropriate forums for it, and tbf I found jumping over them to present directly to TG1 to have been a bit surprising. Are you now asking about discussing the unit protocol further in TG1 before or after Numerics and TG2 discussions on it?
As a sidenote, I'll be on vacation for the rest of January after this week, and so will miss this month's plenary.
